growthexperiments-help-panel-question-wi: Post your question to the Community Help Desk
growthexperiments-help-panel-question-pl: I need some help with editing. How can I...
growthexperiments-help-panel-questionrev: When you submit a question, it gets posted publicly under your username, "$2", to the $1, where another volunteer editor will try to provide an answer within the next day or so.
You'll be notified via email when a response is posted, but your email address is not revealed when other users contact you.
Include page title with my question
growthexperiments-help-panel-question-po: An error occurred when trying to post your question. You can try again or you can visit $1 in your browser and add your question manually.
growthexperiments-help-panel-questioncom: Your question is now on the Community Help Desk for it to be answered by another volunteer editor.
You will receive an email notification when a response is posted, likely within a day or so.

You will receive a notification on {{SITENAME}} when a response is posted, likely within a day or so. If you [[Special:ConfirmEmail|confirm your email]], you will receive an email notification as well.
You will receive a notification on {{SITENAME}} when a response is posted, likely within a day or so.
View your question on the Help Desk
growthexperiments-help-panel-settings-co: This button will take you to Special:Preferences, where you can toggle the setting for "{{int:growthexperiments-help-panel-tog-help-panel}}"
growthexperiments-help-panel-questioncom: By the way, by posting this question, you've just made your first edit on {{SITENAME}}. Congratulations!
growthexperiments-help-panel-questionrev: You'll receive an email confirmation link so that you can be notified of responses. Your email address is not revealed when other users contact you.
If you add an email address to your account, you'll receive an email confirmation link so that you can be notified of responses. Your email address is not revealed when other users contact you.
tag-help_panel_question-description: Edit made from the help panel's post a question feature
